Lo-Fi Stranger Vibes

A Day and Night in Hawkins

StudioRich Blog / field-notes / May 26, 2025

Tags: lo-fi , chillbeats , chillhop , chillvibes , strangerthings , ambient

Lo-Fi Stranger Vibes: A Day and Night in Hawkins

We just wrapped a 2HR ambient lo-fi session inspired by the world of Stranger Things. The result? Stranger Vibes — our longest mix yet and our weirdest.

This isn’t just spooky pads and synth lines. It’s middle school angst, walkie-talkie reverb, and the gentle hum of a bike wheel spinning after dark.

If you ever wished you could study in the Upside Down (but still ace the test), this mix is for you.

Featured: Tracks from StudioRich's Stranger Vibes series
Streamed live from The Vibe Station
Mood: Ambient | Chillhop | Cinematic Lo-Fi | Retro Synths

Watching here? You can also explore each track in our music library—just click a title to listen directly.
